All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Generic abstract class for Data Access Objects (DAO), providing common CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for any entity type.
Bill
Represents a bill generated for a specific order.
Client
Represents a client that places an order.
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class represents the business logic layer for handling operations related to Client entities.
ClientDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for performing operations on the Client entity.
ClientPanel
ClientPanel is a custom JPanel that provides a graphical interface to view and manage clients a Swing application.
ConnectionFactory
ConnectionFactory is a singleton class responsible for managing connections to the MySQL database.
Controller
The Controller class is responsible for initializing the application's main business logic layer (BLL) components and linking them to the corresponding user interface panels within the View.
LogDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling operations related to the billing log.
LogPanel
The LogPanel class represents the UI panel that displays a log of all generated bills (orders).
Main
Entry point of the Orders Management application.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class represents the business logic layer for handling operations related to Orders.
OrderItem
Represents an item that is part of an order, linking a product to an order with a specific quantity and price.
OrderItemBLL
The OrderItemBLL class represents the business logic layer for managing OrderItem entities.
OrderItemDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for the OrderItem entity.
OrderItemView
A view model class that represents an item in an order, including the product's name for display purposes.
OrderPanel
The OrderPanel class provides a user interface for managing product orders.
Orders
Represents an order placed by a client.
OrdersDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for the Orders entity.
Product
Represents a product.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL (Business Logic Layer) class provides the business rules and validation logic for operations involving Product entities.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for the Product entity.
ProductPanel
ProductPanel is a GUI component responsible for managing product-related operations.
TableGenerator
Utility class for generating a JTable based of a list of objects using reflection.
View
The View class represents the main window of the Orders Management application.
